learningObjectives: Understand the requirements of an AI Management System (AIMS) based on ISO/IEC 42001.
Gain a comprehensive understanding of the clauses of ISO/IEC 42001, from Clause 4 to Clause 10.
Develop the skills to establish, implement, maintain, and continually improve an AIMS.
Master AI risk assessment and impact assessment methodologies.
Understand the documentation requirements for ISO/IEC 42001 compliance.
Learn to apply ethical principles and professional conduct standards in AI governance.
Prepare for the AI Safety Analyst certification exam.
courseOverview.prerequisites: Basic understanding of AI concepts and quality management systems.
